# [Interview #897: Twitter 2013 (Non-WoT), Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=897#9)

#### [Justin Kirklin (10 January 2013)](https://twitter.com/JustinKirklin/status/289455825917980674)

Is Kaladin in Stormilight 2?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (10 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/289457642080989184)

Yes, quite a bit.
